name: Illusory
description:
Get your penguin from nest to tasty fish by traversing and deciphering eye bending visual illusions.

Features

  • Puzzle out visually complex optical illusions
  • Play as a cute penguin
  • Enjoy the wintry atmosphere of the antarctic

This game is more about the fun visual experience than anything else. Enjoy the confusion of a visual illusion and get that fish!
